mapper.sql: userid, username, password, departid, gender, roleid, userstate
mapper.select: SELECT s2.nodeid,t.enmu,t.parentnodeid,t.displayorder,s2.`displayname`,s2.`displayorder`,s2.nodeurl FROM ( SELECT s.`nodeid`,s.`displayname` enmu,s.`displayorder`,s.`parentnodeid` FROM userinfo u,roleinfo r1,roleright r2,sysfun s WHERE u.`roleid`=r1.`roleid` AND r1.`roleid`=r2.`roleid` AND r2.`nodeid`=s.`nodeid` and u.userid=#{userid}) t,sysfun s2 WHERE t.parentnodeid = s2.`parentnodeid` order by t.displayorder,s2.`displayorder`

select count(1) from userinfo u,roleinfo r where u.`roleid` = r.`roleid`
and u.username like "%"#{map.username}"%"
